website_summaries.verdict: A unique one-ear design at a hard-to-beat price.
pros: The single earcup allows you to enjoy game audio or music while listening to high-quality chat audio
Can be worn on either ear
cons: Some customers said that their microphone produced a buzzing noise that other players could hear

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I heard these were some of the better headsets on the market. Everybody was always telling me about the Turtle Beach headsets being what you need to get. When I used it, everybody complained about the buzzing and humming and static and that they couldn't hear me speaking. I do not recommend this one at all. Maybe it had a short somewhere, or maybe it's just junk. Either way, I can't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's definitely worth it. It's pretty comfortable, and people hear me without a bunch of fuzz or echos. My voice is clear. If you want a headset to play games that you want to hear, I don't really recommend this because it's a quiet headset, and it isn't good quality. I use it when I'm playing multiplayer games, which as long as I can hear my guns firing, that's all I really need. Other than that, I want to hear my players. However, on the Playstation 4, there are different settings that you need to adjust for the best mix. So in general, it's a good product for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ammaconda

customer_reviews.title: Great & Better Than The Older One
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version, this one so far is way better. The design is better. It's glasses friendly, it has a space for your glasses to be. It's more comfortable on the ear. Sound is much better and louder. The quality of it is great. If you're looking for a one ear headset for video games chatting then this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: M.S

customer_reviews.title: very good mono head set
customer_reviews.text: very good mono head set. Great phone setup for glasses .. .solid mic .... with a little bending, the headset is very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a year. Comfortable with my glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that I could use this headset comfortably while wearing my glasses. I’m very disappointed how short this lasted though, only a year. Now the sound goes lower than it’s supposed to and it’s very hard to hear game volume and party chat; and on top of that, the volume dial doesn’t work most of the time. It is cheap tho, at $15, but I’m not sure I’ll get another one, I may try another brand. Happy gaming my friends :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Voice Quality and Features, Minor Drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale and used but in like new condition, I am not an avid headset wearer by any means but I wanted a simple, wired [better quality] headset for warzone in call of duty. Pros: Quality is clear Voice cancellation Volume control Cons: Ear piece if quite uncomfortable so I have to wear a hoodie or a beanie before putting the headset on. Wires are unnecessarily long and so having to hide them is a pain. All in all, I will likely buy a Bluetooth in the future to avoid the hassle of wires, but this headset for the price is great! The head strap is adjustable for most sized heads, I assume.
customer_reviews.author: .Vic.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Christmas 2019. Worked for all of 4 months. Then stopped. I don’t know what’s wrong. It started with it being weird and only working if it was plugged into the controller in a certain position. Now just doesn’t work at all. They don’t get shoved into a drawer and the cord isn’t ever tied up or anything, they have a hook they hang on so I don’t think it’s the wires. Real disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hailie

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Im a turtle beach guy always have been however this is the 1st headset by turtle beach i was disappointed in. I wanted a simple chat headset to use when im playing non fps games and still chat with friends. Absolutely no comfort, sub-turtle beach audio quality, friends say they hear static and distortion when i speak. Honestly i know it was cheap but come on its turtle beach i expected more from a brand that i have used for as long as i can remember. Definitely not worthy of the stamp that is on all my other headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Engel

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. I like the fit. And I like how I only have to lose the use of one ear while I play so I can hear what's happening in my house too. What I absolutely hate is the complete inability to do away with the crackling and distortion without having to put the other person's voice so far in the background I'm straining to hear them without muting the TV. I've started the refund process for this headset. Do yourself a favor and don't waste the money. I don't know if it'll work better on other systems, but on the PS4 it's seemingly impossible to calibrate this thing properly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kianka

customer_reviews.title: Seems cool at first, not very functional.
customer_reviews.text: The earpiece seems unique and innovative at first, but the volume is poor given that it sits a little away from your ear. The mouthpiece doesn’t stay where you place it, as it has a bit of an elastic quality to the adjustable arm. I have trouble hearing friends and they have some trouble hearing me, something that was not present using the Microsoft mic. Learned my lesson. This is the 3rd such mic I’ve tried. It would seem that if you want a large, comfy noise cancelling headsets you need to shell out more than the original replacement mic. Will buy Microsoft next time.
customer_reviews.author: Shane M.

customer_reviews.title: great chat headset
customer_reviews.text: works great. has good volume control and mic control. Adjustable volume on cord is very nice to have, along with the mute switch. One headphone is what i was looking for since i have 5.1 surround sound and you lose that with other headsets just for chatting with teammates. This was perfect for me and a good price. it is uncomfortable though, luckily my other headset broke so i took the ear cushions off that one and put them on this one. little custom mods to make it fit, but now it feels great and can wear them for hours. but keep in mind these are not very comfortable; 2 out of 5 on the comfort scale
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset for PS4
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase as the price was set as expected for this accessory. I have purchased Turtle Beach headsets before and have spent more and was disappointed as they stopped working after a few months. I am hoping this product doesn't have the same fate in the next few months. Overall a decent headset. I do wish the volume would go up a little bit more, but not a big deal. It's pretty comfy on my head and I have a big dome....so I was glad it didn't snap when putting on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Volume so low headset is near useless
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this headset. The sound is so low and bad it’s basically pointless. When all of the audio is going into one ear you need it to be loud enough to hear the game. The over ear design is also terrible meaning these slip around and pull on your ear. Between the physical discomfort from bad design and the lack of functionality from the bad audio these are not good gaming headphones for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Friends can hear me fine with the mic
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent. Friends can hear me fine with the mic. The cutouts for glasses is brilliant. Have to ding it a star because the headband pad opposite the earcup has an odd angle to it and it digs into the side of my head unless I bend it out before wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Duby

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: like previous customer, purchased one set and headphones went out right away. Then the mic. then the plug, finally got a replacement. It lasted a little while longer but then same things happen. Amazon would not replace them again, so be warned. They only advice from them was sending them back to the manufacturer to be fixed? where you pay shipping to them and back.
customer_reviews.author: dawgsmum

customer_reviews.title: Meets all the basic needs, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Not uncomfortable to wear unless it’s a few hours ... you know how gaming with friends can get, haha. But I like the bendable mic arm and mute switch. Only thing I wish I could adjust sometimes is the speaking volume because I can’t hear one person in the group sometimes but that’s more a them issue and not a feature I’d expect for this reasonable price. I love it in white.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for my son, and myself and they are great! I love that they plug right into the aux plugin on the controller and you don't have to plug them into the PlayStation. They are affordable and sounds good, you can go with an expensive nice set, maybe even something that lights up. However this have proven to be just right!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Expected better from Turtle Beach
customer_reviews.text: This headset is cheap, flimsy, plastic trash. I purchased for the one-ear glasses cutout feature, but the headphone is a joke. Not comfortable at all. Dollar store headphones are probably more comfortable and better quality. Can't speak to the sound quality because the physical quality is so bad the headset was immediately put back in the box to be returned. I expected more from Turtle Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Beane

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs better padding.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 16 year old, he's hard on headphones or they make most of them cheap now. His usually break after a few months. He likes how he can listen to his music with these. However, the padding around the ear areas looks thick but feels like it isn't there once you put them on. Might give a person a headache if they get them easy from pressure from headsets. Needs better padding. Otherwise sound is good, mic is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Sound Leaks
customer_reviews.text: When you have the headphones on, the sound leaks very easily due to the gap for glasses. This would leave you with the audio having to be at a much higher volume than one would want. Also, comfort-wise it is pretty poor. It's light, but flimsy. The only cushioning is a thin strip of foam on one side and the ear cup is only okay. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy-Ann Carter

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, annoying feed back.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap plastic feeling... everyone says theres a feedback. Like a whistle. Wouldn't recommend. If you are looking for a one ear. Go with the trittin kiaken mono.
customer_reviews.author: lee averitt

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is litearlly one of the biggest abortion of comfort I have ever seen. If i asked oyu to design something LESS COMFORTABLE than this piece of trash, you could not do it. It's like wearing a mcdonalds happymeal toy, the side ear offers no cushion whatsoever, just a piece of junk plastic. It's also so tight it gives you a headache. I'm going ot smash mine with a hammer and it will be better off
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for this specific product for use with a Nintendo Switch. I was leery because no where does the headset information state that it will work with the switch. It does and my grandson was happy when he opened it Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Marginally better than the little earbud Sony gives you with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest of cheap headphones. Marginally better than the little earbud Sony gives you with the PlayStation, but somehow worse than a single ear headset from mad catz for my old 360?? It’s really light and the materials are cheap, but it does function as it’s supposed to. So I guess you get what you pay for. It’s a good alternative to no headset at all, but look into getting a decent tritton headset for $10 more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Microphone broke
customer_reviews.text: RHey didn’t last 2 weeks before the microphone went out. We had already thrown away the box so we couldn’t return them.
customer_reviews.author: tinadcarter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to brand expectations
customer_reviews.text: Works, does the job as expected. Item does not quite stand up to the expectations of the name. We needed a 1 ear headphone and they were unusually difficult to find. Bought this one because of the brand name, we were willing to spend more, and it seems as cheap as the price suggests. Not even a full pad for the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stark

customer_reviews.title: I have a similar yet very old PS2(Logitech) wired headset that's falling apart that gets better volume than this
customer_reviews.text: Have to go in your system settings and boost the volume for this to be useable. Maybe because of the semi-open earn design? I have a similar yet very old PS2(Logitech) wired headset that's falling apart that gets better volume than this. Kinda disappointing. This is a cheap headset. The fit and design are actually great but the speaker is underperforming. The mic seems to pick up well.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Works reliably, fits great over my glasses, and does not give me a headache if worn for a few hours. Have not had any complaints about mic sensitivity. The one complaint is that it does not get very loud: I have sensitive hearing and rarely use headphones, and I usually have it on max volume to hear voices clearly unless my fireteam has excellent headsets. Works great for phone calls, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sola

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very uncomfortable in every way possible! The glasses pass through space is great, however the lack of padding elsewhere makes a terrible fit. I hate it and my next step is to try and send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Yvone Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great Chat Headset
customer_reviews.text: I quickly realized that these were not a good headset for me. I play with game audio in my headset only, and for this purpose these are not good for. My boyfriend plays with audio through speakers, however, and uses these strictly for voice chat. 5 stars since that’s what these are designed for! Lucky my purchase didn’t go to waste as my bf loves them.
customer_reviews.author: LoreHound

customer_reviews.title: Headset is adequate. The piece that come over your ...
customer_reviews.text: Headset is adequate. The piece that come over your head fits weird. Must be for a much bigger head. Earpiece sound of ok, but their is minimal padding so the hard inside piece almost sits right on your ear.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: On the cheaper side cost wise but works great and as a bonus to parents...only covers one ear so your child can actually hear you call them and/or how loud they are talking into the mic
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ehh... they do work but the mic is always dropping and doesn't stay stiff ... that's what she said.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Pinkston

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this to replace my Turtle Beach P4C for Playstation that died and I was having trouble replacing. They look very similar, but make no mistake, this does not come close. The ear cup has no padding. It's basically a hollow plastic shell that sits over your ear. The headband is hard rigid plastic and impossible to adjust to a good fit. I couldn't send this back fast enough! I just ordered a Turtle Beach Recon 30x. Same exact headset as the P4C with a green ear cup for XBox.
customer_reviews.author: TuxDog

customer_reviews.title: Dirty not good condition
customer_reviews.text: I chose to purshase the used but in good shape option for a lower cost but these arrived dirty and the cushion part on the head band and side head piece looks like a cat scratched little chunks off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Zero Comfort Poor Sound
customer_reviews.text: The worst and most uncomfortable headset ever.you can barely hear anything and there is minimal padding and the piece that holds it on your head is made for toddlers because it literally strangles your skull. Please don't even purchase this as a temporary headset while you save for a better one use the cheap headphones that came with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: J.Locke

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality.  Great price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a basic headset I could wear with glasses. The sound quality is awesome and my fellow gamers say that they can read me loud and clear!
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It works well and I forget it’s on sometimes after signing off of multiplayer and going single. Ill play for half an hour with it on and then I’m like oh yeah I didn’t need this - it’s that comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Pastrami King

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are just what you get for the price. They are low quality and actually quite uncomfortable. Only 2 stars because they do function just what they do they do poorly. I went back to the stock earpiece for ps4 after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but works
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable but cheap and functional. The black cushion prevent the plastic from digging into your head but there is no ear cushion. Feels off
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Mic breaks quickly
customer_reviews.text: The mic stopped working shortly after purchase. Turtle Beach was great about getting us a replacement. The new one stopped working after one week and they won't let us return it. I definitely would not buy this product. So disappointed! And now stuck with a product that doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as backup for a more expensive Bluetooth headset, but now it is the only headset I use on a regular basis. The earpiece is very comfortable and made for someone who wears glasses when gaming. I no longer have marks where earpieces have gouged into my head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful but issues
customer_reviews.text: It is a light and comfortable head set. Does the job. Mic does not have the rigidity stay where placed. Will slowly fall down. Two sets have had issues with staticky noise being heard by party members. Not many one ear head sets out there.
customer_reviews.author: Landon G.

customer_reviews.title: Plugged in but not tuned out
customer_reviews.text: Good product, quality sound that filters out background noise. Plus I like that it is a one ear headset with mic so the kids can't say they didn't hear me calling them to turn off the game and return to the 3-d world. Cord did not hold up well in sibling tug-o-war.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: extremely uncomfortable on your ear, very low volume. how is this low quality product even put out by such a popular gaming headset company?
customer_reviews.author: WILL

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both got one of these and love them. Voices are clear and it's nice that it's only one ear so we can have them on and still hear the kids argue like they love to do. Only thing I'm not a fan of is how tight the headband is, it gives us a headache if we wear it too long. It's been a few months and it's still really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my fiance so we could game together. He loves it. I got one in white for me as well. Its easy to clean. Has slight gap where cushion touches your head around your ear so you wont damage your eardrums by trapping in all the sound
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Agans

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good. It arrived on time and in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: My son has only been using this for a few days, so I cannot comment on the longevity of the product, but so far so good. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. The price was better than all the others, with just about the same features. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Alise Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had a single thing to complain about except that ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a single thing to complain about except that the chat volume (incoming) doesn't get as loud as I'd want it to sometimes, but that's probably just because I have a loud sound system and unrealistically expect an open ear headphone to be louder than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Best headset I have found! I am deaf in one ear so stereo headsets don't work for me.. and I have a sensitivity to light so I wear sunglasses a lot. And these are glasses friendly. Amazing quality for the money. Very impressive sound. Helped me and fortnite greatly!
customer_reviews.author: Ares Skyfire

customer_reviews.title: but it lacks a comfortable cushion for the earlobe
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it lacks a comfortable cushion for the earlobe. It has a knob to lower and raise the volume of the other players and a switch to mute yourself if needed. The cord is long enough for the casual and the hardcore gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Indysteve

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: These might be the worst headphones I’ve ever used. At max volume you can BAREY hear it. Totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This headset is the most uncomfortable set I've ever had. I can't even wear them and sending back
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Mac

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4, microphones went bad on all.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these. After the microphones went out on first 2 I assumed maybe we were just rough with them. After the microphones went out on the second 2, I realized it’s definitely not us, and that these are legitimately junk. It’s too bad that single-ear headsets with microphones aren’t more common.
customer_reviews.author: Stanzel

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss on long term durability
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these, one is going strong after months, but the other suffers from the age old problem of having to twist the plug just right to avoid static or no sound at all. This is from the same device that the first one still works fine with.
customer_reviews.author: Sargent

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and longer than 2 PS4s
customer_reviews.text: Worked excellent for 2 years, lasted longer than 2 play stations, now the volume is messing up a little. So getting a new pair, 20 bucks is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Maiwald

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but there's a volume issue.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset a few months ago, and they've worked quite well since then. My only issue with the product is that they are kind of quiet, and it can be hard to hear what your friends are saying in a PS4 party even if your volume is all the way up. However, I don't know if this is an issue exclusive to my pair, or if it is universal, as my friend has a pair and has never experienced this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :/
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality of other teammates talking was very poor. Could hardly hear them with my Xbox controller hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Suber

customer_reviews.title: Muting issues for non-ps4 devices. Otherwise solid.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: The mute button works, but prevents the device from realizing there is a mic still connected. While it works fine for the PS4, any other device that has its own mic (phone or laptop for example) treats it like the mic was disconnected and not muted. This causes a reversion to the device mic, defeating the purpose of muting the headset. Aside from this, behaves as expected.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Child size
customer_reviews.text: We recieved the product fast.its more like a child size headset.but we will still use it as back up
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Better than 99% of headsets out there
customer_reviews.text: iv spent 100's of $ on top dollar headsets... n they all crap out after a year. but these bad boys may not be the most comfy but they by far are the most durable and the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katia Turner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable gaming headset clear sound
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product it is clear sound and goes up to a very good volume to break ups . I like that you can pick different colors you can disassemble very easily as well and the ear piece is not a bother it is comfortable 10/10 other parties do not complain about hearing me with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: They came broken they were horrible I hated them they weren’t working I couldn’t hear anything my friends couldn’t hear my voice oh my God it was so bad And also The mic was bendable but it kept on falling down like instead of A bendable metal piece it was like a piece of paper It kept in wiggling
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset with my phone. Good call quality. Only problem is the start is tight on my head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as Intended
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he has not had any issues. Will update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Firmly OK.
customer_reviews.text: If your getting this headset its because you love the one-ear design; Otherwise, seek elsewhere my son.
customer_reviews.author: Adacious Genious

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable at All
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of these one ear headsets so I could hear my game and what's going on around me at the same time. But these are just way too cheap and awkward. They feel so flimsy and are just uncomfortable. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable AF
customer_reviews.text: If I were trying to make myself quit gaming, I'd wear these. 👎 Good Lord. Gone is the soft, comfy, squishy foam and it's replaced by rigid, hard foam that apparently has a cutout for cheesy hipster glasses. The result is one of the most uncomfortable headsets I've ever worn with so-so sound quality. Save yourself the trouble and don't buy these. THEY SUCK.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for game chat
customer_reviews.text: The only this I don't like about the is the mic arm. I think it should be on a swivel knob so can be positioned better. However I think turtle Beach got it right because that would break more often. The sound from it is fine for game chat and you can still here everything around you. No yelling at someone on the couch or missing your phone ring.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Combs

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and you can hear as well as lessen background noise would suggest to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Oiharau

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking to save money don't buy this headset.
customer_reviews.text: Low price is nice but this headset is just cheap. The cords are short and brittle, the Mic looks like it adjusts but doesn't and the connection to the controller is bad from day one, you get static sent you your friends as much as your voice. JUNK!!! Better off buying earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC with no ear padding...OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is all plastic and very uncomfortable. This supposed to be the newer version but they apparently removed the ear padding to make it less expensive. The older version which is discontinued is worth the money if you can locate a seller.
customer_reviews.author: MMMLMM

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Get Plantronics RIG 100X instead.
customer_reviews.text: Returned these. They are cheap for a reason. Incredibly uncomfortable. The ear cup is rock hard, and you can’t adjust the tension to your head size. Felt like my head was in a vice. Get the Plantronics RIG 100X instead. Sound great, highly adjustable for my big head, solid mike, comfortable ear cup. The wire also feels a bit more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: K N

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his PS4. He has no complaints, and loves that it leaves 1 ear open so he can hear whats going on around him
customer_reviews.author: radtechjenn

customer_reviews.text: I should’ve got a better version. This is good but for a few more $ you can do a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. McGown

customer_reviews.title: They are really great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these head phones. They are really great .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish this was louder
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to buy these to be able to hear you mates better or louder than whatever you're currently using to chat with them, you're better off looking somewhere else. That said, if you have the world's most sensitive ear and loudness isn't an issue for you, everything else works just fine, my mates kept telling me they could hear my voice more clearly ever since I first started using these, and even though they're a bit stiff at first, after you use them a few times they stretch out and feel just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Skylith

customer_reviews.title: Good electronics, poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality on both ends is very good but the microphone doesn't stay where it is put just due to gravity, and the lower part of the ear cushion does less cushioning and more digging into my jaw.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and useless
customer_reviews.text: Cheap , cheap cheap , it looks cheap , it feels cheap , waste of money and time , skip this one and more importantly skip this brand
customer_reviews.author: jobob

customer_reviews.title: the headband squeezes my head a little but I think it will get better after some use
customer_reviews.text: simple and effective. the headband squeezes my head a little but I think it will get better after some use. great for summer time because it doesn't fully cup your ear so it feels quite cool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good quality headset.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was sub par and the cord broke after a few months just from normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Ian N.

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Works and sounds great. As I've always gotten with my turtle beach equipment. Needed a 1 sided headset for when I'm playing and needing to listen if my girlfriend needs something as I can't hear her with my other turtle beaches on. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Verellen

customer_reviews.title: Not Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This headset is not adjustable and hurts on smaller heads. Go with a higher end Turtle model, I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not on X box one as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It is stated that this product works with xbox and I even checked the questions section but it does NOT work with my Xbox. Xbox one does not even recognize a mic is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: ... pictures conveniently hide that the earpiece is kind of crap. It is hollow and not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The pictures conveniently hide that the earpiece is kind of crap. It is hollow and not very comfortable. Ok deal for the money I guess, I just expected it to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Light and nice but stiff headband may not fit.
customer_reviews.text: A nice elbow bend single-plug headset with one earpiece wearable on either side. The microphone is flexible and meant to be bent and twisted to fit whichever side yoy wear it on. The sound quality is decent enough both ways for its price range, nothing much more to say about it. The only major problem with this headset is the band that goes once the other side of your head. Its overly stiff and you may not manage to get it to fit comfortably for long.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed. It was cheap and I got what I paid for. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid its great. I needed a quick headset to use after my previous one died on me. I can hear my associates while I play games on my PS4 and they can hear me clearly. They do complain about a slight crackling sound ever so often but other than that I cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth $10
customer_reviews.text: If you want an uncomfortable headphone that you can barely hear anything from this is for you!Do yourself a huge favor and throw in another $30 and get something worth a damn.This is not even worth the $20 I wasted on it.Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: if you're looking for something quick until you get the headphones you want then this is what you should buy. The best headphones to get on amazon is bengoo and its worth it. The headphones are not comfortable and sound is low.
customer_reviews.author: Iconic Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fortnight of use and farting online
customer_reviews.text: The fiance loves this headset, just be careful, the mic on it is excellent... burping, farting, snoring... all of it whoever is online with you will hear.
customer_reviews.author: tidoFM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy fit, can adjust to wear on either side of my head. Easy adjust volume and microphone at a moments notice. Perfect for a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Agans

customer_reviews.title: Great headset by Joshua
customer_reviews.text: Love it works with glasses also universal using on xbox one by Joshua
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. The sound seems to have gotten weak but overall great product
customer_reviews.author: mzhoneydip

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! I love that they are glasses compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the most comfortable or high tech headset but it works great for my PS4 because it plugs straight into the controller. So yes you are tied to your control but it works just fine. The mic and speakers work great.
customer_reviews.author: Drago

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos ABSOLUTELY LOVE this headset!! Its way better than the over priced one that I bought from Playstation.. Turtlebeach 8s definitely the way to go and nicely priced! Thank you guys!!
customer_reviews.author: tara Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. I’d like to say you get what you ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I’d like to say you get what you pay for, but I bought this to replace a $15 headset I purchased at Target. The $15 Target headset is luxury compared to this aweful piece of junk. Sound is great, mic is great, but it’s uncomfortable and I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi & Matt Spielman

customer_reviews.title: mic stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: No reason for this to happen. I don't rough up the headset. Crap!
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fair. Low Quality, Flimsey, Not made well, very uncomfortable. Buy Plantronics instead, they are made much better
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Recon Chat Headset for PS4 Pro, PS4
product_meta.description:
Color:Black



Time to replace the chat headset that came with your console? Then it’s time to get more for your money with the Turtle Beach Recon Chat headset for PlayStation 4. The Recon Chat is lightweight and reversible, and features Turtle Beach’s SpecsFit glasses friendly over-ear design with a unique open ear-cup that lets you hear game audio from the TV or home entertainment system. A high-sensitivity mic ensures your every command is heard loud and clear while the large 40mm speaker delivers chat audio from other players. The Recon Chat easily connects to the PS4 controller via the 3.5mm jack, and in-line controls conveniently place Mic Mute and Chat Volume at your fingertips.

Connections: PlayStation 4 Pro and PlayStation 4: 3.5mm

Xbox One: 3.5mm

Mobile/Tablet Devices: 3.5mm



Product Specifications:

Speaker: 40mm Speaker with Neodymium Magnet

Frequency Response: 80Hz - 10kHz

Ear-cup Design: Over-Ear (Open)

Ear-cushion Materials: Fabric (Black) with Foam Cushioning

Microphone Design: Omni-Directional Boom Mic

Weight: 120g (Headset Only)

Weight: 214g (Headset & Packaging).
feature_bullets: Versatile compatibility: Works great with PS4 Pro and PS4, as well as with the Xbox One controller with the 3.5 millimeter headset jack and mobile/tablet devices with a 3.5 millimeter connection
Unique open ear cup: Hear game audio from the TV or home entertainment system in both ears, while hearing chat audio through the headset
Glasses friendly: Comfortably wear both your glasses and headset thanks to Turtle Beach's innovative specs fit glasses avoidance zone
Reversible over ear design: Wear the headset on the right or left ear, whichever is more comfortable
Convenient in line controls: Convenient in line controls place chat volume and mic mute right at your fingertips

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,890 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
